TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DefaultClaimSet extends System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet

Docs.summary: Provides a default implementation of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This is a concrete implementation of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet> abstract base class. Implementations of <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> can use an instance of this class to add a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet> to an <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim> claims) cil managed

Docs.param: An of type that contains the claims to add to this claim set.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the specified claims.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use this constructor when the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet> is self-issued. For example, a claim set for an anonymous user is self-issued.
This constructor calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.DefaultClaimSet.Initialize%2A> method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks To find claims that match a claim type and right, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.DefaultClaimSet.FindClaims%2A> method.

Docs.summary: Gets the number of objects in this claim set.
Docs.value: The number of objects in this claim set.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim> FindClaims (string claimType, string right);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim> FindClaims(string claimType, string right) cil managed

Docs.param: The uniform resource identifier (URI) of a claim type. Several claim types are available as static properties of the class.
The URI of the right associated with the new claim. Several rights are available as static properties of the class.
Docs.summary: Searches for the object that matches the specified claim type and rights in the .
Docs.returns: An of type that enables you to enumerate the claims that match the specified criteria.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When the `claimType` parameter is `null`, any claim that matches the `right` parameter is considered a match.
When the `right` parameter is `null`, any claim that matches the `claimType` parameter is considered a match.
When both the `claimType` and `right` parameters are `null`, all claims in the collection are returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The constructors that take at least one parameter call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.DefaultClaimSet.Initialize%28System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IList%7BSystem.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim%7D%29> method.

Docs.summary: Gets the object that issued this claim set.
Docs.value: The object that issued this claim set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When this class was created using one of the constructors that do not have an issuer parameter, this <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet> is considered self-issued. The value for the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.DefaultClaimSet.Issuer%2A> property on a self-issued claim set is this claim set.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.DefaultClaimSet.ToString%2A> method contains the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim.Right%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim.ClaimType%2A> properties for every claim in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet>.
